p: Finally, this study also performed the phylogenetic analysis and molecular characterization of representative strains of CHIKV from AP and compared to those from RJ, published previously by our group. In the AP, although no amino acids substitutions were observed, it was demonstrated that all strains analyzed belong to the Asian genotype, corroborating other studies that revealed the city of Oiapoque (AP) as the introduction site for this genotype in Brazil during 2014, originating from the Caribbean and South America [ 17, 64, 65].
